meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sublime.
meanings.sent1: The sublimeness of the mountain peak took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The sublimeness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The sublimeness of the cake made it disappear in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sublimeness of the orchestra's performance echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The sublimeness of the waterfall cascading down the rocks was truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The grandeur or beauty of something that inspires awe or admiration.
meanings.sent1: We were all struck by the sublimeness of the ancient castle ruins.
meanings.sent2: The sublimeness of the cathedral's architecture left visitors in awe.
meanings.sent3: The sublimeness of the puppy's antics brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The sublimeness of the starlit sky on a clear night was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The sublimeness of the garden in full bloom was a sight to behold.
